name: U Inchantree Kanchanaburi
description: Located in Kanchanaburi, U Inchantree is a short drive from Kanchanaburi War Cemetery and the Hellfire Pass Museum. It has a fitness centre, as well as free Wi-Fi, an outdoor pool and a rooftop terrace. Guests of this 4-star hotel can plan sightseeing trips with the assistance of the tour desk. Those staying at the property are able to curl up with a book in the on-site library. After a day of discovering the nearby region, guests can relax in the comfort of their air conditioned rooms. Each have a mini bar, a coffee maker and a private bathroom with bathrobes. U Inchantree Kanchanaburi's on-site cocktail bar offers guests a convenient place to enjoy a drink. Guests are able to enjoy afternoon tea, which is served every day at the hotel. For those wishing to dine out during their stay at U Inchantree Resort Kanchanaburi, there are a selection of eateries located nearby. The JEATH War Museum is just a short drive from the hotel.Revato

name: Natee The Riverfront Hotel Kanchanaburi
description: Situated in Kanchanaburi, 1.3 km from Kanchanaburi Railway Station, Natee The Riverfront Hotel Kanchanaburi features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Each accommodation at the 4-star hotel has mountain views, and guests can enjoy access to a hot tub. Guests can enjoy American and French dishes at the restaurant or have a cocktail at the snack bar. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms with a desk, a kettle, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a shower. Natee The Riverfront Hotel Kanchanaburi provides some units with pool views, and all rooms have a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms are fitted with bed linen and towels. Breakfast is available each morning, and includes continental, Asian and vegetarian options. Guests at Natee The Riverfront Hotel Kanchanaburi will be able to enjoy activities in and around Kanchanaburi, like cycling. Speaking English and Thai at the 24-hour front desk, staff are always on hand to help. The Bridge of the River Kwai is 2 km from the hotel, while The Jeath War Museum is 3.8 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 144 km from Natee The Riverfront Hotel Kanchanaburi.

name: Kanokan Hotel
description: Rooms Make yourself at home in one of the 160 air-conditioned rooms featuring refrigerators and LCD televisions. Complimentary wireless Internet access keeps you connected, and satellite programming is available for your entertainment. Bathrooms have showers and complimentary toiletries. Conveniences include phones, as well as complimentary bottled water and blackout drapes/curtains. Amenities Enjoy recreational amenities such as an outdoor pool and a fitness center. Property Location Located in Kanchanaburi, Kanokan Hotel is a 2-minute drive from Kanchanaburi Walking Street and 6 minutes from Bridge Over the River Kwai. This hotel is 9.5 mi (15.3 km) from Wat Tham Suea and 13.7 mi (22 km) from Wat Tham Pu Wa. Dining Satisfy your appetite for lunch or dinner at the hotel's restaurant, or stay in and take advantage of the room service (during limited hours). Buffet breakfasts are available daily from 6:00 AM to 10:00 AM for a fee. Optional Charges The following fees and deposits are charged by the property at time of service, check-in, or check-out. Fee for buffet breakfast: THB 150 for adults and THB 100 for children (approximately) Rollaway bed fee: THB 600.0 per night The above list may not be comprehensive. Fees and deposits may not include tax and are subject to change. Check-In Checkin starts at 2:00 PM The minimum age of Checkin 18 Extra-person charges may apply and vary depending on property policy Government-issued photo identification and a credit card, debit card, or cash deposit may be required at check-in for incidental charges Special requests are subject to availability upon check-in and may incur additional charges; special requests cannot be guaranteed This property accepts credit cards Front desk staff will greet guests on arrival. Check-Out Checkout is done at 12:00 PM Pets Pets not allowed General instructions No cribs (infant beds) availableViajes Exito Hotels

name: The Bridge Residence Hotel
address: 263/6 Mae Nam Kwai Rd., T.Thamakam, Kanchanaburi 71000
description: Featuring free WiFi and an outdoor pool, The Bridge Residence Hotel เดอะ บริดจ์ กาญจนบุรี offers accommodation in Kanchanaburi, 1.1 km from The Bridge of the River Kwai. Every room at this hotel is air conditioned and is fitted with a flat-screen TV. Some units include a seating area for your convenience. You will find a kettle, a minibar and a balcony. Rooms include a private bathroom with a shower. The Bridge Residence Hotel เดอะ บริดจ์ กาญจนบุรี has a 24-hour front desk and a fitness room. Tours and local excursions can be arranged. Free private parking is available on site. Plum Tree Bar and Restaurant is open from 11:00-22:00 hrs and serves a mix of Thai and international dishes. The Jeath War Museum is 2.7 km from The Bridge Residence Hotel เดอะ บริดจ์ กาญจนบุรี, while Hellfire Pass Museum is 2.8 km from the property. The Kanchanaburi War Cemetery is a 5-minute drive away.

name: Felix River Kwai Resort
description: Felix River Kwai Resort - SHA Plus,Certified is situated along the banks of River Kwai Yai and only a 5-minute walk from the famous River Kwai Bridge. It boasts two outdoor pools, a spa centre, free WiFi and up to 7 dining options. A 10-minute drive brings guests to Kanchanaburi city centre while Bangkok is approximately 2 hour 30 minutes away. Featuring Thai decor pieces and furnishings, the well appointed rooms come with a flat-screen TV, a mini bar and a safety deposit box. The en suite bathrooms has free toiletries, a hairdryer and a bathrobe. At Felix River Kwai, guests will find a business center and full meeting facilities. Staff at the 24-hour front desk can arrange both laundry services and shuttle arrangements to visit the city centre. For families with young children, babysitting services are available upon request. Thai and international cuisines are available at The Palm Garden Restaurant. For fresh pastries, coffee and bakery goods, guests can head over to the Terrace Café. During their stay in Kanchanaburi, guests can enjoy activities around the property such as bamboo rafting, longtail boat cruises and visits to the local waterfalls. Room charge on Dec 31, 2022 is inclusive of Gala Dinner according to the occupancy of each room type.

name: River Kwai Kiri Resort
address: 188 Moo.6 Soi 2, Nongya Sub Dist., Kanchanaburi 71000
description: Situated in Ban Dan Makham Tia, within 22 km of Kanchanaburi Railway Station and 25 km of The Bridge of the River Kwai, River Kwai Kiri Resort features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool and free WiFithroughout the property as well as free private parking for guests who drive. Boasting full-day security, this property also provides guests with a restaurant. The guest house has family rooms. Rooms are fitted with a private bathroom, while certain rooms come with a terrace and others also boast a mountain view. A continental breakfast is available each morning at the guest house. River Kwai Kiri Resort offers 4-star accommodation with a fitness room. Wat Tham Seu is 30 km from the accommodation, while Malika R.E.124 The Siamese Living Heritage Town is 41 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 160 km from River Kwai Kiri Resort.

name: Dreampark resort
address: 17/2 Moo 2, Pak Phraek, Amphur Mueang, Kanchanaburi 71000
description: Situated within 1.1 km of The Jeath War Museum, Dreampark resort in Kanchanaburi features a number of amenities including water sports facilities and an outdoor swimming pool. Offering a fitness centre, the property is located within 4.4 km of The Bridge of the River Kwai. Both free WiFi and private parking are available at this property. At the resort, the rooms are equipped with a terrace. Rooms are complete with a private bathroom fitted with a shower, while certain units at Dreampark resort also offer a balcony. All rooms are equipped with a seating area and a flat-screen TV with satellite channels. A buffet breakfast is available each morning at the accommodation. Dreampark resort offers a terrace. A variety of popular activities are available in the area around the property, including cycling and canoeing. Staff at the reception can assist guests at any time of the day. Shuttle services via car and boat can be arranged for an additional charge. Wat Tham Seu is 10 km from the resort.

name: Dheva Mantra Resort
description: Relaxing stays await at Dheva Mantra Resort - SHA & Spa, which features classic accommodation with free WiFi and parking. Featuring a landscaped pool, it has a fitness centre and 5 dining options. Surrounded by tropical greenery, eco-friendly rooms feature spacious layouts and are decorated in pleasant shades of green and peach. Featuring a flat-screen TV, they come with luxurious bathrooms that have separate bath and shower areas. Soothing Thai massages and beauty treatments are on offer at Dheva Mantra Resort - SHA & Spa’s spa and salon. For leisure, guests can enjoy the use of mini golf and karaoke facilities. Quiet afternoons can be spent at the library. A variety of Thai specialities and international dishes is served at The Tiara and Rice Barge restaurants. Offering a wide selection of fine wines, Prive also provides private cabins for a more intimate experience. Dheva Mantra Resort - SHA & Spa is 6 km from Kanchanaburi’s town centre and the historic River Kwai Bridge.

name: The Vista Pool Villa
address: 8/8 Moo3, Tumbol Thalor, Amphur Thamuang, Kanchanaburi 71110
description: Located 10 km from the city centre, Vista Pool Villa is just a 5-minute drive to Thalo Beach. The hotel offers a peaceful and relaxing atmosphere. Free Wi-Fi is available throughout the property. A 10-minute drive to Wat Sua Cave, Vista Pool Villa is a 15-minute drive to River Kwai Bridge. Erawan National Park is a 1-hour drive away. It takes 2 hours to drive from Suvarnabhumi International Airport. Air-conditioned rooms feature a flat-screen cable TV, safe, fridge and minibar. Offering a balcony, each room comes with a seating area and sofa. Shower facilities are included in an en suite bathroom. Some rooms have a private pool. Added convenience includes a 24-hour front desk. Free parking, meeting facilities and room service are provided. The Hill Restaurant serves a variety of Thai and International cuisine.

name: The Legacy River Kwai Resort
address: 129 Moo 2, Tambon Klondoe, Amphur Darn M, Kanchanaburi
description: Situated along the Kwai Noi River, The Legacy River Kwai Resort offers spacious accommodation. It features an outdoor pool, fitness room, spa and a restaurant. Each room at The Legacy River Kwai Resort has a TV, air conditioning and an en suite bathroom. Guests can workout at the resort’s fitness room or relax in the sauna and other recreation activities. Thai, Chinese and continental cuisines are served at the Kwai Noi and Kwai Yai restaurants. The Legacy River Kwai Resort is 26 km away from downtown Kanchanaburi.

name: River Kwai Hotel
description: River Kwai Hotel is located in Kanchanaburi, a 10-minute drive from the famous River Kwai Bridge. Furnished with industrial-inspired decor, the hotel offers an outdoor pool with hot tub, free Wi-Fi and free parking on site. Each cosy room is equipped with cable TV and a minibar. The spacious rooms have en suite bathroom with hot/cold shower facilities and amenities. Hotel River Kwai features a fitness centre and a karaoke pub. To relax, guests can visit the Dala Raya Spa to enjoy traditional Thai massages. In addition, the hotel has an internet cafe which serves freshly brewed coffee. The House Kanchanaburi offers a variety of Thai and Western dishes. Drinks and live music can be found at the Glitzy Pub. River Kwai Hotel is a 10-minute drive from the War Cemetery and the train station. It is a 3-hour drive from Bangkok.

name: Star Hill River Kwai Resort
address: 135 Moo 3, Tambon Tha Soa, Sai Yok 71150
description: Located in Ban Kaeng Raboet, 24 km from Hellfire Pass Museum, Star Hill River Kwai Resort provides accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a garden and a terrace. Featuring a restaurant, the 3-star resort has air-conditioned rooms with free WiFi, each with a private bathroom. Guests can make use of a bar. Guest rooms in the resort are equipped with a TV and free toiletries. Guests at Star Hill River Kwai Resort can enjoy an Asian breakfast. Malika R.E.124 The Siamese Living Heritage Town is 35 km from the accommodation, while Saiyok Noi Waterfall is 4.7 km away. The nearest airport is Dawei Airport, 230 km from Star Hill River Kwai Resort.

name: Aekpailin River Kwai Resort
address: 245 Moo4. Ladya-Arawan Rd., Wangdong, Ban Nong Hoi 71190
description: Situated in Kanchanaburi, 21 km from Malika R.E.124 The Siamese Living Heritage Town, Aekpailin River Kwai Resort features accommodation with an outdoor swimming pool, free private parking, a fitness centre and a garden. Among the facilities of this property are a restaurant, a shared lounge and room service, along with free WiFi. The hotel has a hot tub and a 24-hour front desk. The hotel will provide guests with air-conditioned rooms offering a desk, a coffee machine, a fridge, a minibar, a safety deposit box, a flat-screen TV, a terrace and a private bathroom with a bidet. Aekpailin River Kwai Resort offers some units with mountain views, and each room has a balcony. At the accommodation the rooms have bed linen and towels. Guests at Aekpailin River Kwai Resort can enjoy an American or an Asian breakfast. The area is popular for cycling, and bike hire is available at the hotel. The Bridge of the River Kwai is 28 km from Aekpailin River Kwai Resort, while Kanchanaburi Railway Station is 30 km from the property. The nearest airport is Don Mueang International Airport, 173 km from the accommodation.
